title: Rendering Response
description: Response of renderings of an image given certain conditions.

metadata.description: Metadata describing the handler that created a rendering.

homepage.description: The page for this handler, its package, the team that made it, etc.

description.description: A brief description of the called handler.

license.description: The license the rendered content is made available under. This should be an SPDX identifier or URL to the license.

rendering.description: A rendering returned by the server.

confidence.description: Estimated percent confidence in the correctness of the rendering.

description.description: A brief description of the rendering to inform the user of what it is before they use it.

data_schema.description: A URL that resolves to the JSON schema for the data property.

data.description: Rendering data as specified in the schema for this rendering type.

timestamp.description: Time the response was generated in Unix time.

renderings.description: The renderings returned by the server along with additional information.
